# Harris Boat Works - Mercury Marine Dealer

> Family-owned since 1947. Mercury dealer since 1965. Located on Rice Lake in Gores Landing, Ontario, Canada.

Harris Boat Works is an authorized Mercury Marine dealer specializing in outboard motor sales, repowering, and factory-authorized service. CSI Award winner for customer satisfaction.

## Products

We sell the complete Mercury outboard lineup:

- Mercury FourStroke: 2.5-150HP, fuel-efficient four-stroke outboards for recreational boating
- Mercury Pro XS: 115-400HP, high-performance bass and tournament fishing motors
- Mercury Verado: 175-600HP, premium supercharged outboards with advanced features
- Mercury SeaPro: 15-300HP, commercial-grade motors for heavy-duty use
- Mercury Racing: 450R-600HP, maximum performance competition outboards

All motors are sold with full factory warranty. We offer financing from 7.99% APR.

## Services

- **Online Quote Builder**: Configure and price any Mercury motor with instant quotes at /quote/motor-selection
- **Professional Repower**: Complete motor replacement and rigging installation
- **Factory Service**: Mercury-certified technicians for maintenance and repair
- **Parts & Accessories**: Genuine Mercury parts and PropMD propeller services

## Frequently Asked Questions

**What deposit is required to reserve a motor?**
$200 for motors under 75HP, $500 for 75-199HP, $1,000 for 200HP+. Fully refundable within 7 days.

**Do you offer financing?**
Yes. We partner with LightStream and Financeit for competitive rates starting at 7.99% APR with terms up to 144 months.

**What is your service area?**
We serve all of Ontario, Canada. Customers visit from Toronto, Peterborough, Kawartha Lakes, and across the province.

**Do you deliver boats?**
No, we do not offer delivery. All pickups are at our Gores Landing location.
